content.35/f Penny 1000/p Penny: 50s/-1000 -1000/farmer -30 30 0 Penny 12 7 0 Pam -100 -100 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite pennyMess/viewport 12 7 true/pause 1000/speak Penny "呃……这里好脏。$s"/pause 500/warp farmer 12 9/playSound doorClose/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/emote Penny 16/pause 300/speak Penny "@！呃……抱歉，这里很乱，我正准备打扫来着的。$u"/pause 500/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 600/emote Penny 32/pause 300/speak Penny "你要帮我么？你是说真的吗？$h"/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 1/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Penny "你可以从那里开始。我打扫厨房。"/move farmer 2 0 1/move farmer 0 -2 1/move farmer 1 0 1/move Penny -1 0 2/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Pam 1/pause 500/faceDirection Pam 3/speak Pam "你在干什么？！$u"/faceDirection Pam 1/faceDirection Pam 3/faceDirection Pam 0/speak Pam "停！别乱动我的东西！$u"/move Penny 2 0 2/pause 500/emote Penny 28/pause 500/speak Penny "母亲，这屋子实在是太脏乱了。@和我想打扫一下。#$b#*嗅嗅* *嗅嗅*……你刚刚在酒馆么？怎么身上一股酒味？$s"/pause 300/move Pam -1 0 3/emote Pam 12/pause 400/speak Pam "我去哪儿跟你无关！$4"/pause 500/speak Penny "这当然与我有关！我不希望你毁了你自己！$a#$b#难道说你没有意识到，你的所作所为也会影响我么？能不能不要这么自私！$a"/faceDirection Pam 0/shake Pam 5000/pause 600/speak Pam "自私？我给你吃给你穿，如今你倒说我自私！？你这个不懂感恩的小……$u"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 500/faceDirection Pam 1/faceDirection Penny 1/move farmer -2 0 2/move farmer 0 2 3/pause 500/speak Pam "你快走吧。很抱歉让你见到了这一幕。$4"/pause 500/move farmer -1 0 2/move farmer 0 1 2/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 700/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/warp farmer -40 -40/playSound doorClose/pause 500/move Pam 0 -1 1/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 3/speak Pam "他是个好人……^她是个好人……"/speak Pam "我不希望你让别人来打扫我的屋子！这很丢人的好么？你明白么？$4"/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 600/showFrame Penny 23/pause 700/speak Penny "……我知道了，妈妈。$s"/pause 1000/mail PennyCleanTrailer/end warpOut
content.36/f Penny 1500/p Penny: musicboxsong/9 7/farmer -30 30 0 Penny 9 7 0/skippable/pause 1000/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 12 9/pause 400/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 300/speak Penny "@，你来的正好！#$b#我马上就要完成我的新料理了！$h"/pause 400/move farmer 0 -2 3/faceDirection Penny 1/move farmer -2 0 3/speak Penny "再一下下就好。"/pause 200/faceDirection Penny 0/pause 200/animate Penny false true 120 29 30/playSound crafting/pause 320/playSound crafting/pause 320/playSound crafting/pause 320/playSound crafting/pause 320/stopAnimation Penny/pause 500/playSound openBox/showFrame Penny 29/pause 400/playSound furnace/showFrame Penny 30/pause 1500/playSound clank/faceDirection Penny 0/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 1 true/showFrame Penny 28/speak Penny "来，给你尝尝。"/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 2/farmerEat 200/showFrame Penny 4/pause 2500/stopAnimation farmer/pause 500/playSound gulp/animate farmer false true 350 104 105/pause 500/specificTemporarySprite pennyCook/pause 1500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/speak Penny "$q 72 null#……怎么样？#$r 72 50 event_cook1#（说谎）嗯嗯！真好吃！#$r 73 -50 event_cook2#呃……我能把剩下的带走吗？#$r 73 0 event_cook3#真是特别的味道……你是怎么把它做得那么耐人寻味的？"/pause 500/speak Penny "$p 72#嘿，既然你是第一个尝这道菜的人，我准备给这道菜起名叫“辣@”。$h|好吧，我想这次料理失败了……$s"/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 600/speak Penny "呃……所以我们要不要一起看个电影什么的？"/pause 500/move farmer 5 0 0 true/move Penny 5 0 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Penny "谢谢你帮我试菜。$h"
content.963313/n pamPotatoJuice: playful/10 7/farmer -100 -100 0 Pam 10 7 0/mail pamNewChannel/skippable/pause 3000/speak Pam "嘿嘿……我看到东西送到了。$h"/pause 500/speak Pam "来尝尝看吧。$h"/pause 1000/playSound coin/showFrame Pam 32/pause 2000/animate Pam false true 400 33 34/playSound glug/pause 800/playSound glug/pause 800/playSound glug/pause 800/playSound glug/pause 790/stopAnimation Pam/showFrame Pam 32/pause 400/emote Pam 40/pause 800/showFrame Pam 35/textAboveHead Pam "呸！"/playSound slimedead/shake Pam 2000/pause 2000/animate Pam false true 400 28 29/speak Pam "我要的是土豆，不是发酵的狒狒的肾！$u"/pause 2000/end dialogue Pam "果汁？嗯，我试过了，孩子。 $4#$b#尝起来怎么样？……有些事情还是不说为妙。我们就不要多谈了。$4"
